title: Lesson 01 - One Minute French
description: In lesson 1 of One Minute French you will learn how to say 'hello' and 'goodbye' in French. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute French at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.

itunes:subtitle: Learn how to say 'hello' and 'goodbye' in French.
